item.description:
I really hope this is good.

I liked First Class a lot, and enjoyed McAvoy and Fassbender’s performances and look forward to seeing them and their present day counterparts in the same movie.

item.title: X-Men: Days Of Future Past Trailer
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

That is the strangest movie title I’ve ever read.

Well it was based on the comic book story arc from the 80s so the movie can be forgiven its strange name.

Interestingly enough, in the comics, this arc began in the dystopian future of 2013, but since the last movie released and in chronological order, The Wolverine, took place in 2007, I guess they figured 6 years wasn’t enough time for the world to become that dystopia.

Anyway I’m definitely excited for this one. For me, at their best, X-Men movies are super awesome. At their worst, they’re just entertaining. But with Bryan Singer back in the director’s chair, I have hope it’ll be more of the former.

Read full topic
item.source: X-Men: Days Of Future Past Trailer
